DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether the patient has agreed to be contacted in the future.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient contact consent.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A time that is yet to come.:the exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A time that is yet to come.
The exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Someone may contact me in the
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone may contact me in the future to ask me to allow other uses of my specimens.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have You
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you obtained the patient's consent for his or her doctor (or somone from the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) to contact him or her in the future to ask him or her to take part in more research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF1 Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Can we contact you in the future by mail, telephone or e-mail

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to future contact about more research?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone from this institution may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to be contacted in the future to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: My doctor or someone may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: AECC Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Someone may contact me in the future to ask me to take part in more research

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text -1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Participant agrees that her study doctor, or their representative, may contact her or her physician to see if she wished to participate in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree to allow someone from the University of Michigan to contact them about participating in an optional audio-recorded telephone interview?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant agree that the researchers, or their representative, may contact them in the future if they have additional questions?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Participant agrees that her study doctor, or their representative, may contact her or her physician to see if she wishes to participate in other research in the future.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant agree that the study doctor, or their representative may contact them or their physician to see in they wish to participate in other research in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given the study team permission to contact them at the end of the study to discuss the possibility of participating in an optional audio-recorded interview.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant agreed to be contacted by the OEAU?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Consent Shared Ind-3 (2018509v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
